faq.question: How long are executive summaries?
faq.answer: Typically 250-500 words (1-2 pages), capturing the most important themes and findings. Length adjusts based on source document complexity.

faq.question: What makes this different from regular summaries?
faq.answer: Executive summaries focus on strategic insights, business implications, and high-level themes rather than detailed facts. Perfect for decision-makers.

faq.question: Can I customize the executive summary format?
faq.answer: Yes! Choose formatting preferences, tone (formal/conversational), and focus areas (findings, recommendations, implications).

faq.question: Is the output professional enough for presentations?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Our AI is trained on executive communication standards, producing polished, professional briefs suitable for any business setting.

faq.question: Can I share executive summaries with my team?
faq.answer: Yes! Share via link, export to PDF/DOCX, or save to your team library. Pro and Team plans include collaboration features.
